column4: Been running Linux and Windows alongside for years. After losing data and an annoying number of hard-to-find programs/scripts, I took to the habit of portable installs and keeping EVERYTHING on the second drive and backed up. =P
looks like I need a second partition
In the absence of a second hard drive, ALWAYS keep a data partition.
I keep just about nothing on my Windows partition, even less on Linux, and everything else on the second drive.
